Step 1: Your contact details

Step 2: Upload your CV (English)

Upload either DOC, DOCX or PDF file types (5MB max)

Filename should contain your name. e.g. Didier Ramos CV

Step 3: Cover letter

Step 4: Vidyard Video

Vidyard Video: Follow the instructions on how to download the extension for Google Chrome to record your video. In the video, show us your personality, tell us about your past experience and explain how that would help your career at CloudTask: Download Here

Step 5: Personality Test
